description:
He`s Charl`s automaton, and has the form of a four-winged dragon. Normally he`s small enough to fit under Charl`s hat or on her shoulder, but he grows in since when she pours magic into him. His magic circuit, Gram, possesses the powerful ability to annihilate any material it cuts. His favorite food is chicken.
Source: ANN
name: Sigmund
